tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_recommendations (
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    preference_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);
CREATE TABLE ShoppingCart (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, product_id UUID, quantity INT);
CREATE TABLE ProductRecommendations (product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, recommended_product_id UUID, score FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE CustomerPreferences (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, preference_category VARCHAR, preference_value VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE PurchasedProducts (customer_id UUID, product_id UUID, purchase_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ProductCategories (category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR);
